title: The Villainess and the Demon Knight - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Naive Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Otome Game   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Strong Love Interests   Villainess Noble Girls   Yandere
author: Nekota   猫田
description:
Cecilia, the Villainess, had been condemned and framed by the heroine just like in the story and thrown into a brothel.

The first customer who came to visit her was the heroine's childhood friend, a hidden character who immensely adored the heroine, known as the powerful Demon Knight. She did nothing much to harass the heroine, but she believed that he came that far to retaliate, just like the Demon Knight she knew.

Cecilia, who was trembling in fear while trying to desperately do her job, and the Devil Knight, who had been in love with Cecilia and determined to overthrow the throne. 

Their love story blossomed that night.>
